lines.text: Before the last one reaches it, I actually cast really hard Control Flame. It totally doesn't work this way, but I do it anyway. You bastard, I didn't mean to do this! And I'm going to hammer like I did with Flaming Sphere when we were playing in private.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you do this. You set off the first Fireball. As it explodes and damages everyone in the radius, it blows one of the throats of the hydra apart. The heads are now caught on fire. As you take the second Fireball, you set it off, shouting that outward. You use Control Flame at the same time as the Telekinesis you're still maintaining to envelop the explosion of the Fireball and contain it in the center. You slam it and let it detonate as part of the impact into the torso, where the heads are currently attached. You end up blowing half the heads off the hydra in the process. The rest of its body's trying to keep itself standing up. However, the explosion itself sent the stone wall around you guys broken into pieces and shards now sticking upward. The hydra backs up and falls onto its side, impaling itself on the shattered stone wall that you had kept up as it slowly slides down on the wound and gurgles out its last life breath, the rest of its body on fire, slowly sinking to the base of the stone wall.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was really cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who can heal really a lot really fast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! I get up and run over to Trinket and hold his little head in my hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's bad?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket's unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run up to Trinket and I cast Cure Wounds on Trinket in a 3rd-level spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys rush up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Vax is rolling down the corpse of the hydra to stand in front of these strangers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've rushed to Trinket's side, too, from where I'm at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're flying in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get closer and do the Superbowl shuffle in front of our new visitors, like, yeah, that's what we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket heals for 21 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket gets up, charred but okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who else is bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket looks over at Tiberius and gives you a glare.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use it again for Vax. Ooh, that's better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled two hit dice--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because right now, as you guys are just standing there, the rest of the other party is now stepping up to you. The main human you now see in armor. He has dirty blond short hair, little bit of stubble on the chin, very well-armored, and the armor itself looks like it's taken a beating. He steps up and says, "All right. I'm going to ask you a "question. What the

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we're killing a hydra. What are you doing today?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fulfilling my contract."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, by not killing the hydra? Because that's what you just did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, we don't know what the fuck you're doing. Take the hydra. We're not here for a bounty; we're trying to help the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, give us the money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did want some proof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skags that wander these lands, taking creatures "from underneath those who are lawfully permitted to hunt these beasts and take that bounty, and "that makes you breakers of the law of Vasselheim."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your name, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns over and looks toward you, takes a couple steps forward, leaping off of the broken stonework on this side. "Aldor. And I work for the Slayer's Take, those of us that are empowered to "hunt contracted bounty-given beasts and creatures in this land. You have gone out and laid claim to "a beast that you had no lawful right to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, the Bastion up on the wall said we could, so that's why we did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While all of this is going down, I'm going to casually walk over and open my little harvesting book and start harvesting some hydra blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not step closer."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd put your hand down. You see, I had a horrible day yesterday, and unless you want to end up like puppy-dog here, we'll all end up in a big pile of blood, unless you find a way to split your take with us, and maybe let us go on our way. You see, we're new in these parts, and we have a habit for killing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who would pay you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where were you going to take this creature for the bounty you keep speaking of?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one is talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Aldor, the same human fighter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aldor, they told us we could kill it and then give the heads and then bring it in and then they would give us money...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't think this through. Listen. Let's level with you. This whole escapade was not very well thought out. We're new in town. We don't want to step on any toes. We did you a solid; we killed your thing. Let's calm it down a notch and let's just talk, shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you just tell people you killed it, we helped, you get the money, you give us half of it, and we call it even?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Otherwise, we're going to go right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magically. If we don't take this creature in after "dealing the killing blow, we're at an impasse with the Slayer's Take."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Can you stab it right now? Maybe it's still breathing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can anybody heal it? Can you kill it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cleric steps forward, this human cleric, older, whitish hair. Steps forward, his mace at his side, armor currently spattered with hydra blood, looking a little charred, but for the most part okay. He says, "Okay. Before this gets out of hand, perhaps if you come with us to the Slayer's "Take, there would be a possibility of us still enacting this contract if we find a way to "magically bind you to it. Now, mind you, I don't know how the funds would be legally distributed; "however, if you talked to the leader of our order, perhaps there could be "some sort of a resolution to this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What funds are we talking about, here? What was the contract that you had been binded by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and take a step back defensively and say, "We don't discuss money "matters out in the open where it's so easy for bodies to be hidden."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who is this leader of yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The one that you're looking for... is on the other page." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aldor is no longer talking, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Sean Connery's talking now. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Huntmaster." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your leader?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I suddenly remembered my Charlemagne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you taunting me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. Not at all. Listen, we were about to come to blows. You and I are going to work this out. Words are mightier than the sword, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't ever do that again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we return, saying that you had acquired our services in the killing of this beast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were subcontracted to you, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The only way that would work is if you were contracted to the Slayer's Take beforehand, which "if you were to agree to be inducted, perhaps that would alleviate the concern. We could then write "you into the contract magically, share the funds, even, and you would be free to accept contracts to "kill creatures at your leisure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, a little clarification. We get paid to kill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're not out here for fun." At which point the tiefling female behind him says, "Hah, say "that yourself. I'm out here for both." She flicks her sword and the blood across the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you in the company or know of Siren?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other. "She's been known to do work with the Slayer's Take, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm definitely in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Introduce yourselves, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's carve up this creature."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what will you do to us? What you did to the hydra? Oh no! Not kill us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I really, really don't like you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Few people do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't have to worry about that. We're out here helping the city for the sake of good, not earning a paycheck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I was going to ask them for a paycheck immediately after we'd gone back to the city, but you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's how you roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a very lucrative trade on monster-hunting in these woods, but you have to "make sure that you're certified. Otherwise, you're taking money and food out of the mouths of us and "our families."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Certification is key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on. Gather up the creature's bits." And they all go to start carving into the body of the hydra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, can we help?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I start doing my thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got the naughty bits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I need to roll for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to, actually. The group are very well trained, and as you go to try to, the tiefling puts her hand down and starts tearing pieces out. There's a dominance, a standoff here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have a scale? Just one more scale?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want some stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right. We'll get it and we'll figure it out when we get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There seems to be a general feel here that you've already broken the law enough. If you really want to fight for it, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's quit while we're ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's deal with the naughty bits later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes about half an hour or so to reap the bits and pieces, then again making your way back, after you've pushed the remainder of the body into the pool itself, letting it slowly sink to the bottom. You all make your way back the path you came in an awkward, quiet march.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you guys set that bait out. You guys killed that ape, didn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aldor gives you a look. "Good to know we aren't the only trackers in this town."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so clever. Clever girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, this is a curious phrase. Please "explain to me what has occurred in your outing on this contract." Aldor scratches the side of his face. "Well, it seems that we have a group of skags."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not intentional. Skags.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not intentional skags out of the forest, intending to hunt and managed to deal the killing "blow to our mark."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, I did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one did it." He wipes some of the soot off his face. "Amongst other issues."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. My aim was off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you can help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The halfling walks from behind his desk with his hands behind his back. (laughs) "You come from "Emon. You are not familiar with Vasselheim, yet the first thing you do upon arriving is leap down "to the Vesper Timberland, fighting a freaking hydra."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was attacking the wall. We were protecting you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hydra attacking your city. We were merely following our conscience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, this is okay. I like the balls you all have. This is ridiculous, what you've done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have enormous balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, we both do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See? They're massive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps away. "Lady. I appreciate your brashness, but I would hope "that you also act like a lady."

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a high standard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Careful where you're walking, little man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All I say is I appreciate-- yes, your bear is quite fierce."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got giant balls, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches past and looks to the wall and you see there are two dire bear heads affixed to the wall of various ancient degrees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't look, Trinket. Don't look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. I can see that you may have breached the contract here, and there may be ways of "perhaps rectifying this, should you take the pledge. The pledge itself is a process, one that I "myself cannot specifically judge upon. This would have to go to my boss, the Headmaster. My wife." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Respect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will see if she is available. One moment." And the halfling patters off down a hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is fucking awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Came back a few moments later. "She would like to see the skags now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is with skags? Just call us people, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a name. Vox Machina.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps you've heard of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have heard of it not before. I will call you this upon you making the pledge. Until then, "you are a group of forest-walking skags."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, husband." The door slams shut behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You two make an adorable couple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's a peach. Good find.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome, skags. You seem to not be liking this title. A skag is an affectionate term we use "for those who break our rules and will go to prison, "perhaps beneath the Amaranthine Oubliette."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, as long as it's affectionate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We understand we've broken the letter of your law, but perhaps not the spirit of your law, which is maybe more important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which is why you are here and not currently being taken for the hall of judgment."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're very grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now. My husband said you have interfered with a contract that has already been enacted."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't know we were interfering with it at the time. We thought we were just doing good, and we're here to make right by that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're tourists, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which is also why you are not at the hall yet. He also said you showed interest in joining "our ranks to avoid this prosecution, which I think is a very smart move." And she walks behind her desk and sits down. "Should you be cut out for our work, that is. You have proven to have slain this "hydra with the accompaniment of one of our roving bands of monster hunters."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't do much, but yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're the one that nearly felled the Hammer."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you have heard of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard of this one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Show her the lip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I kept a keepsake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blood, eyes, teeth, organs. We receive orders from all across Exandria, from as far as even the city "Emon, which you apparently hail from."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a keep there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How nice for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greyskull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will make a note of it." And she reaches over and grabs a quill and not even looking at the paper, just scribbles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're friends with the emperor, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a lot of money to be gained should you be up for it. I would ask you to take a contract, "complete it, and return. That is all. You would have three days to do so. Do you accept?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is involved in signing or binding this contract?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is a small ritual that binds you to the contract. Within this time it must be "completed. Should you fail, the contract is absolved, and your membership is revoked."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's a trial just to bind the contract?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your trial is to take the contract and you have three days to complete it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a payout on this contract?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yes, you will still receive the money for it, and with membership, from what I have been "told by my husband, possibly even share in the bounty for this hydra "you helped slay earlier on this day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, because otherwise they didn't get any credit, right? Because it was like, magically--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Precisely. Also a part of the three-day contract, with three days before it is null and void."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've taken out a beholder and a handful of illithid. We're not really worried about your contract. Give us your contract; we'll sign it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She chuckles under her breath. "That is good to know," she says disbelievingly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an insignia that we get? Is it given to us on some sort of jacket for members only? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches to part of her shoulder pauldron, lifts it up, and you can see there's a brand on the side of her arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My body's a temple. I don't like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then perhaps you'd like the judgment."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The judgment? Oh no, no. Do I have to get branded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It does not hurt much."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whimpers) I'm really wimpy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gnomes... Three days. Will you accept?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it. We're totally tough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you do mine in henna? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will take that as an acceptance on your part, as well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Yes. I'm with my group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, good. Now, I trust you work well as a team, but I am curious how well you work with "others. As this is a test, I will be dividing your band between two contracts."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ex-squeeze me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two teams."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get to pick the teams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, gnome. Giant. Ranger. Tinkerer. You will form the first team."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will form the other team."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does my bear get to come with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your bear is allowed, yes. I shall now look over our extending contracts to decide your test "for tomorrow. Go. Return in the morning fed, armed, and ready to set out. And hopefully get "affiliated with your journeymen members. Now, be gone. I have business to do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no. We work as a pair. Maybe you don't know that about us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, then this should prove a very interesting test."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't understand, we haven't been apart in about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Life is hard here in Vasselheim. Deal with disappointment."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. What was your name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am known as the Huntmaster around these parts. But should you wish the name in its full, "Huntmaster Vanessa Cyndrial."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. Vanessa... Shitmaster...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't. I grab him and I start walking out of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vanessa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cyndrial. C-Y-N-D-R-I-A-L."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am not going to spell that right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the morning: fed, armed, and ready." Knocks the desk twice. Her husband closes the door behind you. You take a deep breath and realize this will be a very interesting challenge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Husband? Do you have a name other than husband?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "They call me Mertin, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mertin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mertin Cyndrial, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll set off on our journey right away, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When do we get our brand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After we complete the task.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taps his nose and points. "You catch on quick. This bodes very well for you, possibly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have a good three days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we stay in the guildhall while we're waiting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not members. Soon, though. When one's brand is achieved, as much as you like."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Grog. Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question, husband. Is there a way to change those little pairings that she made? Perhaps get my brother and I on the same team?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks off. And we'll conclude the session for the evening there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [end of transcript]
